headline: Ferguson's U.S. Sales Jump 7% in Q4: What's Powering Its Growth?
summary: FERG's U.S. sales climb 7% in Q4, fueled by booming non-residential demand and infrastructure strength across key markets.

headline: Should You Jump Into Johnson Controls After the Stock’s 38% Surge in 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with your Johnson Controls International shares, or considering if now is the time to jump in? You are not alone. The stock has been on an absolute tear, so anyone watching the market this year has likely noticed its upswing. Over just the past week, shares are up 1.3%. That may be a blip. But when you zoom out, the bigger story emerges: up 3.2% for the month, an impressive 38.8% year-to-date gain, and an eye-popping 181.3% return over five years. Clearly, something...

headline: Alpha Modus Escalates Patent Enforcement Offensive Targeting Global Retail Tech Giants
summary: CORNELIUS, N.C., Oct. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Alpha Modus, Corp., the subsidiary of Alpha Modus Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMOD) has filed new patent infringement lawsuits in the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Texas against Sensormatic Electronics LLC and Johnson Controls International PLC, as well as against Navori SA and meldCX Pty Ltd—marking a decisive escalation in the company’s ongoing campaign to enforce its intellectual property across the global retail technology land
